alert.note: Alert for Chester; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 9:25AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cabarrus, Mecklenburg, southeastern Rowan, eastern Chester and southeastern York Counties through 1000 AM EST... At 925 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Uptown Charlotte to 10 miles southwest of Lancaster. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rock Hill, Uptown Charlotte, Kannapolis, Downtown Concord, Huntersville, Central Charlotte, South Charlotte, Northeast Charlotte, Southwest Charlotte and East Charlotte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
